ext_description.message: List your current games on boardgamearena.com

report_error.message: You can report this at $email$.

optionFriendsActivity.message: Friends' activity in the game log

optionFloatingGame.message: In a floating menu (only for this game)

optionFloatingAlways.message: In a floating menu (for all games)

optionHiddenGamesWarning.message: Remove a game from this list to display it on Board Game Arena. (You must reload the page for the changes to be effective)

optionNavigationWarning.message: Warning: only change the configuration on this screen if you really know what you're doing ;)

reportCreationWarning.message: You're using a browser extension that significantly alters the visuals of the site and certain games. If you have a problem with the dark mode, don't create a report, come and talk about it on the forum!
